items.title: FloatCMS
items.description: Headless GraphQL / API Service for flexibly managing data for any number of web applications, static sites, or native applications.
items.content:
## FloatCMS

A headless CMS built with a GraphQL API layer on top of Django, designed to flexibly manage content for web applications, static sites, and native apps.

### Key Features

- GraphQL API for flexible content queries
- Django backend for robust data management
- React-based admin interface
- Deployed on AWS EC2

items.title: Waiver Application Portal (WSPIR)
items.description: Integrating project waivers into a single system / simple UI. Built while working fully remotely.
items.content:
## Waiver Application Portal (WSPIR)

A unified portal for managing project waivers, consolidating multiple systems into a single, intuitive interface.

### Key Features

- Centralized waiver management system
- Streamlined approval workflows
- Built with Django and React
- Deployed on Kubernetes with CI/CD via Drone

items.title: ITAR Ticket Dashboard (IADS)
items.description: Unifying 4 JPL applications into a single metrics application to streamline ITAR verification of JPL documents and shipments.
items.content:
## ITAR Ticket Dashboard (IADS)

A metrics dashboard that unifies four separate JPL applications into a single interface for ITAR verification tracking.

### Key Features

- Consolidated metrics from 4 JPL applications
- Streamlined ITAR document and shipment verification
- Django and React stack
- Kubernetes deployment with Drone CI and Sentry monitoring
